title: yusrime
author: yusrime
content: NEED 150$ value usdt for 30days to complete the SFP airdrop.Repayment 150$ + 10% of the bonus received from airdrop

comments.author: Edwardard
comments.body: Quote from: yusrime on November 28, 2022, 03:40:46 AMNEED 150$ value usdt for 30days to complete the SFP airdrop.Repayment 150$ + 10% of the bonus received from airdropYou just joined the forum about a month ago and being a newbie you won't get any loans without any valid collateral. You will have better odds asking with your relatives or parents.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: yusrime on November 28, 2022, 04:00:45 AMHow old should my account be for asking loan here?It can vary. Someone may create an account one month ago and create a helpful post while the account gets 200 or more merit. The person may get more amount than you asked. But based on your merit history, trust history, and rank you will not get 5$ loan only from you. Also, a user who is about 3 years older than me and his/her rank is a hero but I have not accepted as the person could not post any content for what the user receives any merit. All the merit received by him/her is by airdrop.

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: Quote from: yusrime on November 28, 2022, 04:00:45 AMHow old should my account be for asking loan here? Is every older account owners repaid the loan.I don't want to argue with you. As I Think this board is only about truthfulness of the person not about ranking.Don't get angree with me.  Collateral is everything.  Just ask a fiat bank.  You may not be a customer when you chose a bank to take out a loan with, but if you offer collateral for a short term loan such as this, then you'll usually get a loan.  Same with the pawn shop lenders or pay day lenders.  They want to be assured they will be reimbursed by you.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: yusrime on November 29, 2022, 02:12:37 PMYes sure next time that I here for loan I'll be with collateral.What can I offer as collateral?.Thanks Timelord2067 for reply my post.Valid collateral can be anything that can be sold at any time at market price. On the forum, only the altcoin is valid if you take a bitcoin loan. But the market cap of the collateral should be enough good. Also, if you want to take altcoin as a loan then you can provide bitcoin or other altcoins as collateral.

comments.author: examplens
